Hi!

I am a physics PhD student working in Professor Chakramâ€™s group at Rutgers University. I am interested in developing hardware for quantum computing. I am currently exploring the control of a multimode cavity circuit quantum electrodynamics-based device. I grew up in California where I attended the University of California, Berkeley to study physics as an undergraduate.

Papers

Jordan Huang, Thomas J. DiNapoli, Gavin Rockwood, Ming Yuan, Prathyankara Narasimhan, Mustafa Bal, Francesco Crisa, Sabrina Garattoni, Yao Lu, Liang Jiang, and Srivatsan Chakram (2024). Fast Sideband Control of a Multimode Bosonic Memory with a Weakly Coupled Transmon Ancilla. In preparation.
